name: Supermarket and Shopping Fun
description:
Supermarket Shopping Fun is presenting by TinyBit for your girls and kids to enjoy the real taste of supermarket experience. It is the free educational game for your kids. Kids can always have a real excitement when their parents go for shopping in a supermarket store to collect some grocery items, cooking items, vegetables,fruits and clothes.In this supermarket shopping mall you can purchase all of your daily life accessories.

***How to play the game***

First of all you will have 4 different options of characters or kids with 5 different exciting levels for the real interest of your babies and girls. In the dressup level, you can select some awesome outfits for the kids. In Cooking level, you can make the best cake making with your kids.If you are planning to celebrate the birthday of your babies of girls then this game can give you the real adventure to make cakes yourself.As you know that the care of your family members is very important so you can choose the fresh vegetable and fruits for your kids.

In this free game you will help the cash register girl for the cleaning of floors in grocery and food selection section.Help your customers and get ready for the fun in this store.Kids will enjoy the scanning items and issuing invoices.

You and your kids have to be the best customer and Supermarket cash storekeeper.Do not forget to play our other games for kids and girls.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
